name: The Heart Go Wander
description:
A short puzzle game about certain kinds of relationships.

Z to undo, R to restart a level.
X or Space to make menu selection or continue from intermission screen.

Made with PuzzleScript.

Music: Devils Eyes by Qua (quamusic.com)

DEV NOTES:
I spent far more time on this than I intended, but I'm pretty happy with the result. It's my first pure puzzle game, though I do try to tell a narrative through the mechanics. It's up for your own interpretation as to what I was trying to say.
